org.gatein.api.page
Class PageQuery.Builder

java.lang.Object
  org.gatein.api.page.PageQuery.Builder
Enclosing class:
PageQuery
public static class PageQuery.Builder
extends Object

The builder responsible for creating PageQuery objects.
